BC_SEQ_100448639731726782442230.BIZ_COLLECTION_KOR_NAME: AI PM DUNA - WBS 관리 -> WBS 화면

wbs.SERVICE_NAME:
SELECT E.PMCode ,
E.PMStartDateTime ,
E.PMEndDateTime ,
C.PhaseName,
A.StartDateTime ,
A.EndDateTime ,
DATE_FORMAT(A.StartDateTime,'%Y%m%d') AS StartDate ,
DATE_FORMAT(A.EndDateTime,'%Y%m%d') AS EndDate ,
A.Progress ,
B.ActivityName ,
D.TemplateName ,
B.RoleCode ,
(SELECT RoleName FROM Role WHERE RoleCode = B.RoleCode) AS RoleName
FROM Schedule A,
ProjectActivity B LEFT OUTER JOIN ProjectTemplate D ON B.ActivityCode AND D.ActivityCode,
ProjectPhase C,
ProjectManagement E
WHERE A.PMActivityCode = B.ActivityCode
AND B.PhaseCode = C.PhaseCode
AND A.PMCode = E.PMCode
AND E.PMCode = ?
ORDER BY C.PhaseSeq , A.StartDateTime , A.EndDateTime
